item.title: CaPa: Carve-n-Paint Synthesis for Efficient 4K Textured Mesh Generation
item.description: CaPa: Carve-n-Paint Synthesis generates hyper-realistic 4K textured meshes in under 30 seconds, setting a new standard for efficient 3D asset creation.
